biotools.summary: Extendable software package for Bayesian analysis of protein, DNA and RNA sequences. Multiple alignments, phylogenetic trees and evolutionary parameters are co-estimated in a Markov Chain Monte Carlo framework, allowing for reliable quantification of the uncertainty in these estimates.

bioschemas.name: StatAlign
